# Overview of project

This website is associated to Martinez et al. and provides the reproducible workflow integrating code, data, methods and key outcomes associated to this study aiming at developing an *in vitro* method of propagation using growth regulators for Basin Big sagebrush (*Artemisia tridentata* subsp. *tridentata*: 2n=2x=18) to support genome sequencing and GxE research.
